GK19bahcar6u:18: jāte ca svapnāvaśeṣadarśane hṛdayāvaśeṣāvasthāne citrāvaśeṣākṛtau kāvyāvaśeṣanāmni naranāthe,

GK19bahcar6u:23: sa mandamabravīt--“deva! yathādiśasi dvāri' iti śrutvā ca sodaryasnehanihitaniratiśayamanyumṛdūkṛtamanāḥ kathamapi na vavāma bāṣpavāripravāhotpīḍena saha jīvitam /
GK19bahcar6u:24: anantaraṃ ca dvārapālapramuktena prathamapraviṣṭena parijanenevākrandena kathyamānam,

GK19bahcar6u:62: abhūmibhūtena kālakramopacayānāṃ śokena kavalīkṛtaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaramapaśyat /

GK19bahcar6u:64_1: saṃkalpayanniva sarvaduḥkhāni dīrgheṇa dardaṇḍadvayena gṛhītvā kaṇṭhe muktakaṇṭhaṃ

GK19bahcar6u:76: sarvasminneva ca nagare na kenacidapāci na kenacidasnāyi nābhoji /

GK19bahcar6u:82: saṃcarantyāḥ samadhukararavaṃ kairavākaraṃ kalahaṃsaramaṇīramaṇīyaṃ māṇikyakāñjīkiṅkiṇījālamivācakāṇa śriyaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:84: asyāṃ ca velāyāmanatikramaṇīyavacanairupasṛtya pradhānasāmantairvi jñāpyamānaḥ kathaṃ kathamapyabhukta /
GK19bahcar6u:85: prabhātāyāṃ ca śarvaryāṃ sarveṣu praviṣṭeṣu rājasu samīpasthitaṃ hraṣadevamuvāca--“tāta! bhūmirasi guruniyogānām /
GK19bahcar6u:86: śaiśava evāgrāhi guṇavatpatākeva bhavatā tātasya cittavṛttiḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:87: yato bhavantamevaṃ vidhaṃ vidheyaṃ vidhighidhānopanatanairghṛṇyamidaṃ kimapi bibhaṇiṣati me hṛdayam /
GK19bahcar6u:90: śṛṇu, na khalu na jānāsi lokavṛttam /

GK19bahcar6u:96: yaṃ ca kila śokaḥ smabhibhavati taṃ kāpuruṣamācakṣate śāstravidaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:99: svabhāvasya seyaṃ kāpuruṣatā vā straiṇaṃ vā yadevamāspadaṃ pitṛśokahutabhujo jāto 'smi /
GK19bahcar6u:100: mama hi bhūbhṛti paryaste niravaśeṣataḥ prasravaṇānīva srutānyaśrūṇyastamite mahati tejasyandhakārībhūtadaśāśasya pranaṣṭaḥ prajñālokaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:104: pade pade digdharopāhateva hariṇī muhyati matiḥ,

GK19bahcar6u:112: tāto hutāśanatāmeva kevalāmāpanno 'pi naivaṃ dahati mām /
GK19bahcar6u:113: antastadevamidamasāṃparāyikamiva hṛdayamavaṣṭabhya vyutthitaḥ śokau durnivāro vāḍava iva vārirāśim,
GK19bahcar6u:117: dahati dārayati tanūkaroti kavalayati ca mām /
GK19bahcar6u:118: kāmaṃ na śaknoti me hṛdayaṃ tādṛśasya samerukalpasya kalpamahāpuruṣasya vinipātamaśrubindubhireva kevalairativāhayitum /
GK19bahcar6u:119: rājye viṣa iva cakorasya me viraktaṃ cakṣuḥ /

GK19bahcar6u:121: kṣaṇamapi dagdhagṛhe śakuniriva na pārayāmi thātum /

GK19bahcar6u:136: athavā tātavināśaniḥśaṅkakalikālakrīḍitaṃ yenāyaṃ yaḥ kaścidiva yatkiñcanakāriṇaṃ māmapuṣyabhūtivaṃśasaṃbhūtamiva,

GK19bahcar6u:193: sa kathaṃ kathamapyakathayat--“deva! piśācānāmiva nīcātmanāṃ caritāni chidraprahārīṇi prāyaśo bhavanti /
GK19bahcar6u:194: yato yasminnahanyavaniṃpatiruparata ityabhūdvārtā tasminneva devo grahavarmā durātmanā mālavarājena jīvalokamātmānaḥ sukṛtena saha tyājitaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:195: bhartṛdārikāpi rājyaśrīḥ kālāyasanigaḍayugalacumbitacaraṇā caurāṅganeva saṃyatā kānyakubje kārāyāṃ nikṣiptā /
GK19bahcar6u:196: kiṃvadantī ca yathā kilānāyakaṃ sādhanaṃ matvā jighṛkṣuḥ sudurmatiretāmapi bhuvamājigamiṣati /
GK19bahcar6u:202: kṛpābhūmibhūtāyāśca svasuḥ snehātsa tādṛśo 'pi baddhamūlo 'pyatyantagururekapada evāsya nanāsya nanāśa śokāvegaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:203: viveśa ca sahasā kesarīva giriguhāgṛhaṃ gabhīrahṛdayaṃ bhayaṅkaraḥ kopāvegaḥ /

GK19bahcar6u:205: darpātparāmṛśannakhakiraṇasalilanirjharaiḥ samarabhārasaṃbhāvanābhiṣekamiva cakāra diṅnāgakumbhakūṭavikaṭasya bāhuśikharakośasya vāmaḥ pāṇipallavaḥ /

GK19bahcar6u:229: yadi bāla iti nitarāṃ tarhi na parityājyo 'smi /

GK19bahcar6u:243: kā ceyamātmaṃbharitā bhujasya te yadekākī kṣīrodaphenapaṭalapāṇḍuramamṛtamiva yaśaḥ pipāsati /

GK19bahcar6u:255: mama tu durnivārāyāmasyāṃ vipakṣakṣapaṇakṣudhi kṣubhitāyāṃ kṣamyatāmayamekākinaḥ kopakavala ekaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:263: svayūthabhraṣṭa iva vanyaḥ karī devo harṣaḥ kathaṃ kathamapyekākī kālaṃ tamanaiṣīt /
GK19bahcar6u:264: atikrānteṣu bahuṣu vāsareṣu kadācittayaiva bhrātṛgamanaduḥkhāsikayā dattaprajāgarasibhāgaśeṣāyāṃ triyāmāyāṃ yāmikena sīyamānāmimāmāryāṃ śuśrāva--

GK19bahcar6u:267: tāṃ ca śrutvā sutarāmanityatābhāvanayā dūyamānahṛdayaḥ prakṣīṇabhūyiṣṭhāyāṃ kṣapāyāṃ kṣaṇamiva nidrāmalabhata /
GK19bahcar6u:274: pratyahaṃ rāhuravikalakāyabandha iva kabandhavati bradhnabimbe ghaṭamāno vibhāvyate /
GK19bahcar6u:276: dine dine dāruṇā diśāṃ dāhā dṛśyante /
GK19bahcar6u:279: niśi niśi itastataḥ prajvalitābhirulkābhirugraṃ grahayuddhamiva viyati vilokayanti vilolatārakāḥ kakubhaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:282: asminnasmadvaṃśe kariṇa iva karīraṃ komalamapi kalayataḥ kṛtāntasya kaḥ paripanthī?

GK19bahcar6u:290: duḥkhadūraprarūḍharomṇā mūkenāpi mukhena svāmivyasanamavicchinnairaśrubindubhirvijñāpayantaṃ kuntalaṃ nāma bṛhadaśvavāram,
GK19bahcar6u:296: tasmācca helānirjitamālavānīkamapi gauḍādhipena mithyopacāropacitaviśvāsaṃ muktaśastramekākinaṃ viśrabdhaṃ svabhavana eva bhrātaraṃ vyāpāditamaśrauṣīt /
GK19bahcar6u:309: parīkṣita iva sarvabhogidahanodyataḥ vṛkodara iva ripurudhiratṛṣitaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:319_0: avādīcca gauḍādhipādhamamapahāya kastādṛśaṃ mahāpuruṣa tatkṣaṇa ve nirvyājabhūjavīryanirjitasamastarājakaṃ
GK19bahcar6u:319_1: muktaśastraṃ kalaśayonimiva kṛṣṇavartmaprasūtirīdṛśena sarvavīralokavimarditena mṛtyunā śamayedevamāryam /
GK19bahcar6u:320: anāryaṃ ca taṃ muktvā bhāgīrathīphenapaṭalapāṇḍurāḥ keṣāṃ manaḥsu saraḥsu rājahaṃsā iva paraśurāmaparākramasmṛtikṛto na kuryurāryaśauryagṛṇāḥ pakṣapātam /
GK19bahcar6u:322: kāṃ nu gatiṃ gamiṣyati, kāṃ vā yoniṃ pravekṣyati, kasminvā narake nipatiṣyati /
GK19bahcar6u:324: nāmāpi ca gṛhṇato 'sya pāpakāriṇaḥ pāpamalena lipyata iva me jihvā /
GK19bahcar6u:325: kiṃ vāṅgīkṛtya kāryamāryastena kṣudreṇānupraviśya vigataghṛṇena ghuṇeneva sakalabhuvanāhlādanacaturaścandanastambhaḥ kṣayamupanītaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:326: nūnaṃ nānena mūḍhena madhurasāsvādalubdhena madhvivāryajīvitamākarṣatā bhāvī dṛṣṭaḥ śilīmukhasaṃpātopadravaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:327: nijagṛhadūṣaṇaṃ jālamārgapradīpakena kajjalamivātimalinaṃ kevalamayaśaḥ saṃcitaṃ gauḍādhamena /
GK19bahcar6u:328: ntavāśvevāstamupagatavatyapi tribhuvanacūḍāmaṇau savitari vedhasādiṣṭaḥ satpathaśatrorandhakārasya nigrahāya grahaṣaṇḍavihāraikahariṇādhipaḥ śaśī /
GK19bahcar6u:329: vinayavidhāyini bhagne 'pi cāṅkuśe vidyata eva vyālavāraṇasya vinayāya sakalamattamātaṅgakumbhasthalasthiraśirobhāgabhiduraḥ khalataraḥ kesarinakharaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:330: tādṛśāḥ kuvaikaṭikā iva tejasviratnavināśakāḥ kasya na vadhyāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:332: ' ityevamabhidadhata evāsya piturapi mitraṃ senāpatiḥ samagravigrahaprāgraharo haritālaśailāvadātadehaḥ pariṇatapraguṇasālaprakāṇḍaprakāśaḥ prāṃśuḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:336: kathamapi sāramayeṣu śiroruheṣu śaśikaranikarasitasaralaśiroruhasaṭālāṃ saiṃhīmiva niṣkapaṭaparākramarasaracitāṃ saṃkrānto jīvannevajātim,
GK19bahcar6u:338: dhavalasthūlaguñjāpicchapracchāditakapolabhāgabhāsvareṇa vamanniva vikramakālamakāle 'pi vikāśikāśakānanaviśadaṃ śaradārambhaṃ bhīmena mukhena,
GK19bahcar6u:339: mṛtamapi hṛdayasthitaṃ svāminamiva sitacāmareṇa vījayannābhilambena kūrcakalāpena,
GK19bahcar6u:366: saṃnidhāvevasamupaviṣṭaḥ siṃhanādanāmā svareṇaiva dundubhighoṣagambhīreṇa subhaṭānāṃ samararasamānayanvijñāpitavān--
GK19bahcar6u:367: “deva! na vkacitkṛtāśrayayā malinayā malinatarāḥ kokilayā kākā iva kāpuruṣā hatalakṣmyā vipralabhyamānamātmānaṃ na cetayante /
GK19bahcar6u:368: śriyo hi doṣā andhatādayaḥ kāmalā vikārāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:370: kiṃ vā karotu varākaḥ yanātibhīrutayā nityaparāṅmukhena natu dṛṣṭānyeva sarvātiśāyiśauryātiśayaśvayathukapilakapolapulakapallavitakopānalāni kupitānāṃ tejasvināṃ mukhāni /
GK19bahcar6u:371: nāsau tapasvī jānātyevaṃ yathābhicārā iva viprakṛtāḥ sadyaḥ sakalakulapralayamupāharanti manasvina iti /
GK19bahcar6u:374: manasvināṃ hi pradhanapradhānadhane dhanuṣi dhriyamāṇe sati ca kamalākalahaṃsīkelikuvalayakānane kṛpāṇe kṛpaṇopāyāḥ payodhimathanaprabhṛtayo 'pi śrīmamatthānasya kiṃ punarīdṛśāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:375_0: yeṣāṃ ca dhātrā dharitrīṃ trātuṃ niyuktāḥ svayamasamarthā iva kulaśakarkaśabhujaparighapraharaṇahetorudgiranti
GK19bahcar6u:375_1: girayo 'pi lohāni te kathamiva bāhuśālino manasāpi vimalayaśobhāndhavā dhyāyeyurakāryam /
GK19bahcar6u:376: sarvagrahābhibhavabhāsvarāṇāṃ hi subhaṭakarāṇāmagrato diggrahaṇe paṅgavaḥ pataṅgakarāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:377: mahāmahiṣaśṛṅgataraṅgabhaṅgabhahgurabhīṣaṇāntarālā lokapravādamātreṇa ca dakṣiṇāśā paramārthato bhaṭamrukuṭiradhivāso yamasya /
GK19bahcar6u:378: citraṃ ca yadunmuktasiṃhanādānāṃ sahasā sāhasarabhasarasaromāñcakaṇṭakanikareṇa saha na niryānti saṭāḥ śūrāṇāṃ raṇeṣu /
GK19bahcar6u:379: dvayameva ca catuḥsāgarasaṃbhṛtasya bhūtisaṃbhārasya bājanaṃ pratipakṣadāhi dāruṇaṃ vaḍavāmukhaṃ vā mahāpuruṣahṛdayaṃ vā /
GK19bahcar6u:381: vṛthāvitatavipulaphaṇābhāro bhujahgānāṃ bhartā bibharti yo bhogena mṛtpiṇḍameva kevalam /
GK19bahcar6u:382: apratihataśāsanākrāntyupabhogasukharasaṃ tu rasāyāṃ dikkuñjarabhārabhāsvaraprakoṣṭhā vīrabāhava eva jānanti /
GK19bahcar6u:384: kātarasya tu śaśina iva hariṇahṛdayasya pāṇḍurapṛṣṭhasya suto dvirātramapi niścalā lakṣmīḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:393: kavaciṣu ripūraḥkavāṭeṣu pātyamānāḥ, pāvakaśikhāmiva śriyamapi vamanti niṣṭhurā nistriṃśaprahārāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:395: na ca svapnadṛṣṭanaṣṭeṣviva kṣaṇikeṣu śarīreṣu nibadhnanti bandhubuddhiṃ prabuddhāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:397: anavarataprajvalitatejaḥprasarabhāsvarasvabhāvaṃ ca maṇipradopamiva kaluṣaḥ kajjalamalo na spṛśatyevātitejasvinaṃ śokaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:398: satvaṃ sattvavatāmagraṇīḥ prāgraharaḥ prājñānāṃ prathamaḥ samarthānāṃ praṣṭho 'bhijātānāmagresarastejasvināmādirasahiṣṇūnām /
GK19bahcar6u:399: etāśca satatasaṃnihitadhūmāyamānakopāgnayaḥ sulabhāsidhārātoyatṛptayo vikaṭabāhuvanacchāyopagūḍhā dhīratāyā nivāsaśiśirabhūmayaḥ svāyattāḥ subhaṭānāmuraḥkavāṭabhittayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:401: tathā kuru yathā nānyo 'pi kaścidācaratyevaṃ bhūyaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:413: yenaiva ca te gataḥ pitā pitāmahaḥ prapitāmaho vā tameva mā hāsīstribhuvanaspṛhaṇīyaṃ panthānam /
GK19bahcar6u:414: avahāya kupuruṣocitāṃ śucaṃ pratipadyasva kulakramāgatāṃ kesarīva kuraṅgīṃ rājalakṣmīm /
GK19bahcar6u:415: deva! devabhūyaṃ gate narendre duṣṭagauḍabhujaṅgajagdhajīvite ca rājyavardhane vṛtte 'sminmahāpralaye dharaṇīdhāraṇāyādhunā tvaṃ śeṣaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:417: kṣmāpatīnāṃ śiraḥsu śaratsaviteva lalāṭantapān prayaccha pādanyāsān /
GK19bahcar6u:419_0: api ca hate pitaryekākī tapasvī mṛgaiḥ saha saṃvardhitaḥ sahajabrāhnaṇyamārdavasukumāramanāḥ
GK19bahcar6u:422: na hyayamarātiraktacandanacarcāśiśiropacāramantareṇa sāmyati paribhavānalapacyamānadehasya devasya duḥkhadāhajvara sudāruṇaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:428: itarathā hi me gṛhītabhuvi bhogināthe 'pi dāyādadṛṣṭirīrṣyālorbhujasya /
GK19bahcar6u:430: upari gacchatīcchati nigrahāya grahagaṇe 'pi bhrūlatā calitum /
GK19bahcar6u:435: kiṃ punarīdṛśe durjāte jāte jātāmarṣanirbhare ca manasi nāstyevāvakāśaḥ sokakriyākaraṇasya?
GK19bahcar6u:436: api ca hṛdayaviṣamaśalye musalye jīvati jālme jagadvigahite gauḍādhipādhamacaṇḍāle jihremi śuṣkādharapuṭaḥ pījeva pratikāraśūnyaṃ śucā śūtkartum /
GK19bahcar6u:441_1: nirgauḍaṃ gāṃ na karomi tatastanūnapāti pītasarpiṣi pataṅga iva pātakī pātayāmyātmānam'
GK19bahcar6u:446: ā guhyakagehinīparimalasugandhigandhapāṣāṇavāsitaguhāgṛhācca gandhamādanāt sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ sajjīkriyantāṃ karāḥ karadānāya śastragrahaṇāya vā,
GK19bahcar6u:456: paṅgoriva mekuto nivṛttistāvadyāvanna kṛtaḥ sarvadvīpāntarasaṃcārī sakalanarapatimukuṭamaṇiśilālokamayaḥ pādalepaḥ' /
GK19bahcar6u:457: iti kṛtaniścayaśca muktāsthāno visarjitarājalokaḥ snānārambhākāṅkṣī sabhāmatyākṣīt /
GK19bahcar6u:459: agalacca darpaprasara iva śrutapratijñasya śāmyadūṣmā divasastribhuvanasya /
GK19bahcar6u:460: tataśca nijādhikārāpahārabhīta iva bhagavatyapi vkāpi gate gatatejasyahimabhāsi,
GK19bahcar6u:463: bhuvanavyāpinīṃ sandhyāṃ pratijñāmiva mānayati nataśirasi ghaṭitāñjalivane jane sakale,
GK19bahcar6u:464: svapadacyuticakitadikpāladīyamānābhralihalohaprākāravalayakalitāsvi va bahalatimiramālātiraudhīyamānāsu dikṣu pradoṣāsthāne nāticiraṃ tasthau /
GK19bahcar6u:465: namannṛpalokalolāṃśukapavanakampitaśikhairdīpikācakravālairapi praṇamyamāna iva prāhiṇollokaṃ pratiṣiddhaparijanapraveśaśca śayanagṛhaṃ prāviśat /
GK19bahcar6u:467: dīpadvitīyaṃ ca tamabhisara iva labdhāvasarastarasā bhrātṛśoko jagrāha /
GK19bahcar6u:474: kathaṃ cāsya me hatahṛdayasyāryavirahe sakṛdapi yuktaṃ samacchvasitum /
GK19bahcar6u:479: dagdharoṣāntaritaśucā suciraṃ ruditamapi na muktakaṇṭhaṃ gataghṛṇena mayā /
GK19bahcar6u:481: lokayātrāmātranibandhanā bāndhavatā yatrāhamapi nāma para ivārye svargasthe svastha ivāse /
GK19bahcar6u:482: daivahatakena phalamāsāditamīdṛśi parasparaprītibandhanirvṛtahṛdaye sukhabhāji bhrātṛmithune vighaṭite /
GK19bahcar6u:483: tathā ca candramayā iva jagadāhlādino lokāntarībhūtasya lagnacitāgnaya ivāryasya ta eva dahanti guṇāḥ ityetāni cānyāni ca hṛdayena paryadevata /
GK19bahcar6u:484: prabhātāyāṃ ca śarvaryāṃ pratīhāramādideśāśeṣagajasādhanādhikṛtaṃ skandaguptaṃ draṣṭumicchāmīti /
GK19bahcar6u:505: atisnigdhamadhuradhavalaviśālatayā pītakṣīrodeneva pibannīkṣaṇayugmāyāmena diśāmāyāmaṃ merutaṭādapi vikaṭavipulālikaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:507: ātmasthasamastamattamātaṅgasādhano 'pyaspṛṣṭo madena bhūtimānapi snehamayaḥ pārthivo 'pi guṇamayaḥ kariṇāmiva dānavatāmupari sthitaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:514: upaviṣṭaṃ ca nātinikaṭe taṃ tadā jagāda devo harṣaḥ--
GK19bahcar6u:518: ityevamabhihitaśca pramamya vyajñāpayat--“kṛtamavadhārayatu svāmī samādiṣṭaṃ kitu svalpaṃ vijñapyamasti bhartṛbhakteḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:520: devena hi puṣyabhūtivaṃśasaṃbhūtasyābhijanasyābijātyasya sahajasya tejasodikkarikarapralambasya bāhuyugalasyāsādhāraṇasya ca sodarasnehasya sarvaṃ sadṛśamupakrāntam /
GK19bahcar6u:521: kākodarābidhānāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ kṛmayo 'pi na mṛṣyanti nikāraṃ kimuta bhavādṛśāstejasāṃ rāśayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:522: kevalaṃ devarājyavardhanodantena kiyadapi dṛṣṭameva devena durjanadaurātmyam /
GK19bahcar6u:523: ridṛśāḥ khalu lokasvabhāvāḥ pratigrāmaṃ pratinagaraṃ pratideśaṃ pratidvīpaṃ pratidiśaṃ ca bhinnā veśāścākārāścāhārāśca vyāhārāśca vyavahārāśca janapadānām /
GK19bahcar6u:529: cūḍāmaṇilagnalekhapratibimbavācitākṣarā ca cārucāmokaracāmaragrāhiṇī yamatāṃ yayau yavaneśvarasya /
GK19bahcar6u:530: lobhabahulaṃ ca bahulaniśi nidhānamutkhanantamutkhātakhaḍgapramāthinī mamantha māthuraṃ bṛhadrathaṃ vidūrathavarūthinī /
GK19bahcar6u:531: nāgavanavihāraśīlaṃ ca māyāmātaṅgāṅgānnirgatā mahāsenasainikā vatsapatiṃ nyayaṃsiṣuḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:532: atidayitalāsyasya ca śailūṣamadyamadhyāsya mūrdhānamasilatayā mṛṇālamivālunādagnimitrātmajasya sumitrasya mitradevaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:535: senānīranāryo mauryaṃ bṛhadrathaṃ pipeṣa puṣyamitraḥ svāminam /
GK19bahcar6u:536: āścaryakutūhalī ca daṇḍopanatayavananirmitena nabhastalayāyinā yantrayānenānīyata vkāpi kākavarṇaḥ śaiśunāgiśca nagaropakaṇṭhe kaṇṭhe nicakṛte nistriṃśena /
GK19bahcar6u:537: atistrīsaṅgaratamanaṅgaparavasaṃ śuṅgamamātyo vasudevo devabhūtidāsīduhitrā devīvyañjanayā vītajīvitamakārayat /
GK19bahcar6u:540: mahākālamahe ca manāmāṃsavikrayavādavātūlaṃ vetālastālajaṅgho jaghāna jaghanyajaṃ pradyotasya pauṇakiṃ kumāraṃ kumārasenam /
GK19bahcar6u:542: strīviśvāsinasca mahādevīgṛhagūḍhabhittibhāgbhūtvā bhrātā bhadrasenasyābhavanmṛtyave kāliṅgasya vīrasenaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:544: utsārakaruciṃ carahasi sasacivameva dūrīcakāra cakoranāthaṃ śūdrakadūtaścandraketuṃ jīvitāt /
GK19bahcar6u:545: mṛgayāsaktasya ca mathnato gaṇḍakānuddaṇḍanaḍvalanalavananilīnāsca campādhipacamūcarabhaṭāscāmuṇḍīpaterācemuḥ prāṇān puṣkarasya /
GK19bahcar6u:546: bandirāgaparaṃ ca paraprayuktā jayaśabdamukharamukhā maṅkhā maukhariṃ mūrkhaṃ kṣatravarmāṇamudakhanan /
GK19bahcar6u:547: aripure ca parakalatrakāmukaṃ kāminīveśaguptaśca candraguptaḥ śakapatimaśātayaditi /
GK19bahcar6u:548: pramattānāṃ ca pramadākṛtā api pramādāḥ śrutiviṣayamāgatā eva devasya /
GK19bahcar6u:549: yathā madhumoditaṃ madhurakasaṃliptairlājaiḥ suprabhā putrarājyārthaṃ mahāsena kāśirājaṃ jaghāna /
GK19bahcar6u:550: vyājajanitakandarpadarpā ca darpaṇena kṣuradhārāparyantenāyodhyādhipatiṃ parantapaṃ ratnavatī jārūthyam,
GK19bahcar6u:551: viṣacūrṇacumbitamakarandena ca karṇendīvareṇa devakī devarānuruktā devasenaṃ sauhnyam,
GK19bahcar6u:552: yogaparāgavirasavarṣiṇā ca maṇinūpureṇa vallabhā sapatnīruṣā vairantyaṃ rantidevam,
GK19bahcar6u:553: veṇīvinigūḍhena ca śastreṇa bindumatīṃ vṛṣṇiṃ vindūratham,
GK19bahcar6u:554: rasadigdhamadyena ca mekhalāmaṇinā hasavatī sauvīraṃ vorasenam,
GK19bahcar6u:555: adṛśyāgadaviliptavadanā ca viṣavāruṇīgaṇḍūṣapāyanena pauravī pauraveśvaraṃ somakam' /
GK19bahcar6u:558: tataśca tathā kṛtapratijñe prayāṇaṃ vijayāya diśāṃ samādiśati deve harṣe gatāyuṣāṃ pratisāmantānāmudavasiteṣu bahurūpāṇyupaliṅgāni vitenire /
GK19bahcar6u:561: ciraṃ vivṛtavikṛtavadanaviva raviniḥsṛtavahnivisarā vāsare 'pi virasaṃ viresuściramaśivārthamaśivāḥ śivāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:570: samāghrātayamamahiṣagandhā iva tāmyantaḥ stambakarimapi harayo haritaṃ navayavasaṃ na ceruḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:577: vadhyālaṅkāraraktacandanarasacchaṭā ivālakṣyanta śūrāṇāṃ patitāḥ śarīreṣu vikasitabandhūkakusumaśoṇitaśociṣaḥ śoṇitavṛṣṭayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:578: paryagnīkurvāṇā iva vinaśvarīṃ śriyamaviralasphuratsphuliṅgāhgārodgāradagdhatārāgaṇā gaṇaśaḥ patantaḥ prajvalanto na vyaraṃsiṣurulkādaṇḍāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:579: prathamameva pratihārīvāpaharantī pratibhavanaṃ cāmarātapatravyajanāni paruṣā babhrāma vātyeti /
GK19bahcar6u:580: iti śrībāṇamaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite rājapratijñāvarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭha ucchvāsaḥ/
